query.value:
select CUSTOMERCODE, OFFERCODE ,METADATA$ACTION, METADATA$ISUPDATE
from RS_SCHEMA.CUSTOMERTOOFFER_DELTA  where transactionid ='@{pipeline().parameters.TransactionId}'
group BY CUSTOMERCODE, OFFERCODE, METADATA$ACTION, METADATA$ISUPDATE

select CUSTOMERCODE, PRODUCTCODE, RECORANK, RECOTYPE, MODELNAME, METADATA$ACTION, METADATA$ISUPDATE
from RS_SCHEMA.CUSTOMERTOPRODUCT_DELTA  where transactionid ='@{pipeline().parameters.TransactionId}'
group BY CUSTOMERCODE, PRODUCTCODE, RECORANK, RECOTYPE, MODELNAME, METADATA$ACTION, METADATA$ISUPDATE

text.value:
-- Stage 4 - version 2.0.1

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------- OfferStagingRuning_*
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- Available
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

BEGIN
    BEGIN TRANSACTION;

    DELETE OfferStagingRuning_Available
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_Available main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_Available_Delta] staging
                  ON main.OfferId = staging.OfferId
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
      AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

    UPDATE OfferStagingRuning_Available
    SET ProgramCode   = staging.ProgramCode
      , RunId         = staging.RunId
      , OfferCode     = staging.OfferCode
      , ProgramEngine = staging.ProgramEngine
      , MemberAccount = IIF(staging.MemberAccount = '', NULL, CONVERT(INT, staging.MemberAccount))
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_Available main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_Available_Delta] staging
                  ON main.OfferId = staging.OfferId
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT';

    INSERT INTO OfferStagingRuning_Available (OfferId, ProgramCode, RunId, OfferCode, ProgramEngine, MemberAccount)
    SELECT OfferId
         , ProgramCode
         , RunId
         , OfferCode
         , ProgramEngine
         , IIF(MemberAccount = '', NULL, CONVERT(INT, MemberAccount))
    FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_Available_Delta] AS staging
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
      AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1
                     FROM OfferStagingRuning_Available AS main
                     WHERE main.OfferId = staging.OfferId);

    COMMIT TRANSACTION;
END;


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- Mass
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
    BEGIN TRANSACTION;

    DELETE OfferStagingRuning_Mass
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_Mass main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_Mass_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
      AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

    UPDATE OfferStagingRuning_Mass
    SET ProgramCode     = staging.ProgramCode
      , OfferCode       = staging.OfferCode
      , RunId           = staging.RunId
      , OfferId         = staging.OfferId
      , Name            = staging.Name
      , StartDate       = IIF(staging.StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, staging.StartDate))
      , ProductCode     = staging.ProductCode
      , PrimaryUPC      = staging.PrimaryUPC
      , DepartmentName1 = staging.DepartmentName1
      , DiscountPricing = staging.DiscountPricing
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_Mass main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_Mass_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT';

    INSERT INTO OfferStagingRuning_Mass ( Id, ProgramCode, OfferCode, RunId, OfferId, Name, StartDate, ProductCode
                                        , PrimaryUPC, DepartmentName1, DiscountPricing)
    SELECT Id
         , ProgramCode
         , OfferCode
         , RunId
         , OfferId
         , Name
         , IIF(StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, StartDate))
         , ProductCode
         , PrimaryUPC
         , DepartmentName1
         , DiscountPricing
    FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_Mass_Delta] AS staging
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
      AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1
                     FROM OfferStagingRuning_Mass AS main
                     WHERE main.OfferId = staging.OfferId);

    COMMIT TRANSACTION;
END

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- TargetStore
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
    BEGIN TRANSACTION;

    DELETE OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
      AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

    UPDATE OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore
    SET OfferCode       = staging.OfferCode
      , ProgramCode     = staging.ProgramCode
      , StoreCode       = staging.StoreCode
      , RunId           = staging.RunId
      , OfferId         = staging.OfferId
      , Name            = staging.Name
      , StartDate       = IIF(staging.StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, staging.StartDate))
      , ProductCode     = staging.ProductCode
      , PrimaryUPC      = staging.PrimaryUPC
      , DepartmentName1 = staging.DepartmentName1
      , DiscountPricing = staging.DiscountPricing
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT';

    INSERT INTO OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore ( Id, OfferCode, ProgramCode, StoreCode, RunId, OfferId, Name, StartDate
                                               , ProductCode, PrimaryUPC, DepartmentName1, DiscountPricing)
    SELECT Id
         , OfferCode
         , ProgramCode
         , StoreCode
         , RunId
         , OfferId
         , Name
         , IIF(StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, StartDate))
         , ProductCode
         , PrimaryUPC
         , DepartmentName1
         , DiscountPricing
    FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore_Delta] AS staging
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
      AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1
                     FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetStore AS main
                     WHERE main.OfferId = staging.OfferId);

    COMMIT TRANSACTION;
END


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- TargetList
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
    BEGIN TRANSACTION;

    DELETE OfferStagingRuning_TargetList
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetList main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetList_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
      AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

    UPDATE OfferStagingRuning_TargetList
    SET Id              = staging.Id
      , OfferCode       = staging.OfferCode
      , ProgramCode     = staging.ProgramCode
      , RunId           = staging.RunId
      , OfferId         = staging.OfferId
      , Name            = staging.Name
      , StartDate       = IIF(staging.StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, staging.StartDate))
      , ProductCode     = staging.ProductCode
      , PrimaryUPC      = staging.PrimaryUPC
      , DepartmentName1 = staging.DepartmentName1
      , DiscountPricing = staging.DiscountPricing
      , IsActive        = IIF(staging.IsActive = '', NULL, CONVERT(BIT, staging.IsActive))
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetList main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetList_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT';

    INSERT INTO OfferStagingRuning_TargetList ( Id, OfferCode, ProgramCode, RunId, OfferId, Name, StartDate, ProductCode
                                              , PrimaryUPC, DepartmentName1, DiscountPricing, IsActive)
    SELECT Id
         , OfferCode
         , ProgramCode
         , RunId
         , OfferId
         , Name
         , IIF(StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, StartDate))
         , ProductCode
         , PrimaryUPC
         , DepartmentName1
         , DiscountPricing
         , IIF(IsActive = '', NULL, CONVERT(BIT, IsActive))
    FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetList_Delta] AS staging
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
      AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1
                     FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetList AS main
                     WHERE main.OfferId = staging.OfferId);

    COMMIT TRANSACTION;
END


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- TargetUser
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
    BEGIN TRANSACTION;

    DELETE OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
      AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

    UPDATE OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser
    SET ProgramCode     = staging.ProgramCode
      , StoreCode       = staging.StoreCode
      , RunId           = staging.RunId
      , OfferId         = staging.OfferId
      , OfferCode       = staging.OfferCode
      , Name            = staging.Name
      , StartDate       = IIF(staging.StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, staging.StartDate))
      , ProductCode     = staging.ProductCode
      , PrimaryUPC      = staging.PrimaryUPC
      , DepartmentName1 = staging.DepartmentName1
      , DiscountPricing = staging.DiscountPricing
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT';

    INSERT INTO OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser ( Id, ProgramCode, StoreCode, RunId, OfferId, OfferCode, Name, StartDate
                                              , ProductCode, PrimaryUPC, DepartmentName1, DiscountPricing)
    SELECT Id
         , ProgramCode
         , StoreCode
         , RunId
         , OfferId
         , OfferCode
         , Name
         , IIF(StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, StartDate))
         , ProductCode
         , PrimaryUPC
         , DepartmentName1
         , DiscountPricing
    FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser_Delta] AS staging
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
      AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1
                     FROM OfferStagingRuning_TargetUser AS main
                     WHERE main.OfferId = staging.OfferId);

    COMMIT TRANSACTION;
END


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- NewEnrollment
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
    BEGIN TRANSACTION;

    DELETE OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
      AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

    UPDATE OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment
    SET ProgramCode     = staging.ProgramCode
      , OfferCode       = staging.OfferCode
      , RunId           = staging.RunId
      , OfferId         = staging.OfferId
      , Name            = staging.Name
      , StartDate       = IIF(staging.StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, staging.StartDate))
      , ProductCode     = staging.ProductCode
      , PrimaryUPC      = staging.PrimaryUPC
      , DepartmentName1 = staging.DepartmentName1
      , DiscountPricing = staging.DiscountPricing
      , IsActive        = IIF(staging.IsActive = '', NULL, CONVERT(BIT, staging.IsActive))
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT';

    INSERT INTO OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment ( Id, ProgramCode, OfferCode, RunId, OfferId, Name, StartDate
                                                 , ProductCode
                                                 , PrimaryUPC, DepartmentName1, DiscountPricing, IsActive)
    SELECT Id
         , ProgramCode
         , OfferCode
         , RunId
         , OfferId
         , Name
         , IIF(StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, StartDate))
         , ProductCode
         , PrimaryUPC
         , DepartmentName1
         , DiscountPricing
         , IIF(IsActive = '', NULL, CONVERT(BIT, IsActive))
    FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment_Delta] AS staging
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
      AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1
                     FROM OfferStagingRuning_NewEnrollment AS main
                     WHERE main.OfferId = staging.OfferId);

    COMMIT TRANSACTION;
END


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- RECO
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
    BEGIN TRANSACTION;

    DELETE OfferStagingRuning_RECO
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_RECO main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_RECO_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
      AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

    UPDATE OfferStagingRuning_RECO
    SET OfferCode       = staging.OfferCode
      , ProgramCode     = staging.ProgramCode
      , RunId           = staging.RunId
      , StoreCode       = staging.StoreCode
      , OfferId         = staging.OfferId
      , StartDate       = IIF(staging.StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, staging.StartDate))
      , ProductCode     = staging.ProductCode
      , PrimaryUPC      = staging.PrimaryUPC
      , Movement        = IIF(staging.Movement = '', NULL, CONVERT(INT, staging.Movement))
      , IsOnSale        = IIF(staging.IsOnSale = '', NULL, CONVERT(BIT, staging.IsOnSale))
      , IsSingleProduct = IIF(staging.IsSingleProduct = '', NULL, CONVERT(BIT, staging.IsSingleProduct))
      , DepartmentCode1 = staging.DepartmentCode1
      , DepartmentName1 = staging.DepartmentName1
      , DepartmentCode2 = staging.DepartmentCode2
      , DepartmentName2 = staging.DepartmentName2
      , DepartmentCode3 = staging.DepartmentCode3
      , DepartmentName3 = staging.DepartmentName3
    FROM OfferStagingRuning_RECO main
             JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_RECO_Delta] staging
                  ON main.Id = staging.Id
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT';

    INSERT INTO OfferStagingRuning_RECO ( Id, OfferCode, ProgramCode, RunId, StoreCode, OfferId, StartDate
                                        , ProductCode, PrimaryUPC, Movement, IsOnSale, IsSingleProduct
                                        , DepartmentCode1, DepartmentName1, DepartmentCode2, DepartmentName2
                                        , DepartmentCode3, DepartmentName3)
    SELECT Id
         , OfferCode
         , ProgramCode
         , RunId
         , StoreCode
         , OfferId
         , IIF(StartDate = '', NULL, CONVERT(DATETIME, StartDate))
         , ProductCode
         , PrimaryUPC
         , IIF(Movement = '', NULL, CONVERT(INT, Movement))
         , IIF(IsOnSale = '', NULL, CONVERT(BIT, IsOnSale))
         , IIF(IsSingleProduct = '', NULL, CONVERT(BIT, IsSingleProduct))
         , DepartmentCode1
         , DepartmentName1
         , DepartmentCode2
         , DepartmentName2
         , DepartmentCode3
         , DepartmentName3
    FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferStagingRuning_RECO_Delta] AS staging
    WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
      AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1
                     FROM OfferStagingRuning_RECO AS main
                     WHERE main.OfferId = staging.OfferId);

    COMMIT TRANSACTION;
END


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------- OfferProgramRuns
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
UPDATE OfferProgramruns
SET status        = staging.status
  , stagingstatus = staging.stagingstatus
FROM OfferProgramruns main
         JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_OfferProgramruns_Delta] staging ON main.Id = staging.Id
WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
  AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 1;

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------- CustomerToOffer
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DELETE CustomerToOffer
FROM CustomerToOffer main
         JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_CustomerToOffer_Delta] staging
              ON main.OfferCode = staging.OfferCode AND main.CustomerCode = staging.CustomerCode
WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
  AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

INSERT INTO CustomerToOffer (OfferCode, CustomerCode)
SELECT staging.OfferCode, staging.CustomerCode
FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_CustomerToOffer_Delta] staging
         LEFT JOIN CustomerToOffer main
                   ON main.OfferCode = staging.OfferCode AND main.CustomerCode = staging.CustomerCode
WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
  AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0
  AND main.OfferCode IS NULL;


-- DROP INDEX [NonClusteredIndex-20200807-144413-CustomerCode] ON [CustomerToProduct];
-- DROP INDEX [NonClusteredIndex-20200807-150823-ProductCode] ON [CustomerToProduct];
-- DROP INDEX [NonClusteredIndex-20210609-225408-RecoRank] ON [CustomerToProduct];
--
-- ALTER TABLE [CustomerToProduct]
--     DROP CONSTRAINT PK_CustomerToOffer;
--
-- CREATE INDEX [NonClusteredIndex-20200807-144413-CustomerCode] ON [CustomerToProduct] (CustomerCode);
-- CREATE INDEX [NonClusteredIndex-20200807-150823-ProductCode] ON [CustomerToProduct] (ProductCode);
-- CREATE INDEX [NonClusteredIndex-20210609-225408-RecoRank] ON [CustomerToProduct] (RecoRank);
-- ALTER TABLE [customertoproduct]
--     ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CustomerToOffer PRIMARY KEY (CustomerCode, ProductCode);

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------- CustomerToProduct
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DELETE CustomerToProduct
FROM CustomerToProduct main
         JOIN [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_CustomerToProduct_Delta] staging
              ON main.ProductCode = staging.ProductCode AND main.CustomerCode = staging.CustomerCode
WHERE Metadata$Action = 'DELETE'
  AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0;

INSERT INTO CustomerToProduct (ProductCode, CustomerCode, RecoRank, RecoType, ModelName)
SELECT staging.ProductCode, staging.CustomerCode, staging.RecoRank, staging.RecoType, staging.ModelName
FROM [Sandbox-UnitedStaging].dbo.[StagingOffer_CustomerToProduct_Delta] staging
         LEFT JOIN CustomerToProduct main
                   ON main.ProductCode = staging.ProductCode AND main.CustomerCode = staging.CustomerCode
WHERE Metadata$Action = 'INSERT'
  AND Metadata$IsUpdate = 0
  AND main.ProductCode IS NULL;

WITH cte AS (SELECT OfferId
                  , ProgramCode
                  , RunId
                  , OfferCode
                  , ProgramEngine
                  , MemberAccount
                  , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
        PARTITION BY
        OfferId,
        ProgramCode,
        RunId,
        OfferCode,
        ProgramEngine,
        MemberAccount
        ORDER BY
            OfferId,
            ProgramCode,
            RunId,
            OfferCode,
            ProgramEngine,
            MemberAccount
        ) row_num
             FROM [dbo].[OfferStagingRuning_Available])
DELETE
FROM cte
WHERE row_num > 1;

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------- Handle clear cache
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
EXEC [dbo].[FlushCacheCouchBase]

set TransactionId = '@{pipeline().parameters.TransactionId}';
begin

if (exists (select top 1 1 from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETUSER_DELTA)) then

delete from  RS_SCHEMA.ElasticDocument main using (
     select offerCode from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETUSER_DELTA
     where Metadata$Action = 'DELETE' and Metadata$IsUpdate =FALSE
     and OFFERID not in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETUSER_DELTA  where Metadata$Action = 'INSERT')
     and OFFERID not in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETUSER)
      group by offerCode
 ) index_delete 
 where index_delete.OfferCode = main.OfferCode ;
 

merge into RS_SCHEMA.ElasticDocument main
using(
 select --top 100
  PROGRAMCODE, 
  CustomerToOffer.CustomerCode || '_' || targetUser.offercode as id, 
  CustomerToOffer.CustomerCode  as customercode, 
  targetUser.OFFERCODE,targetUser.PRODUCTCODE, targetUser.STORECODE
  from (
     select Max(PROGRAMCODE) as PROGRAMCODE, offerCode,
     ARRAY_AGG (distinct productcode) within group (order by productcode) as productcode , 
     ARRAY_AGG (distinct storeCode) within group (order by storeCode) as storecode 
     from  RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETUSER
       where OFFERID in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETUSER_DELTA)
     group by offerCode
 ) targetUser
join  RS_SCHEMA.CustomerToOffer on CustomerToOffer.OfferCode = targetUser.OfferCode) indexchange on  indexchange.Id = main.Id
when matched then update set
							PROGRAMCODE = indexchange.PROGRAMCODE,
					        CUSTOMERCODE = indexchange.CUSTOMERCODE,
                            OFFERCODE = indexchange.OFFERCODE,
                            PRODUCTCODE = indexchange.PRODUCTCODE,
                            STORECODE = indexchange.STORECODE
when not matched then insert (PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE)
values (PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE);
end if;

IF  (exists(select top 1 1 from RS_SCHEMA.CustomerToOffer_DELTA where transactionid = $TransactionId)) then
delete from  RS_SCHEMA.ElasticDocument main using (
     select CUSTOMERCODE, OFFERCODE from RS_SCHEMA.CustomerToOffer_DELTA
     where Metadata$Action = 'DELETE' and Metadata$IsUpdate =FALSE and transactionid = $TransactionId
 ) index_delete 
 where index_delete.OfferCode = main.OfferCode and index_delete.CustomerCode = main.CUSTOMERCODE;


merge into RS_SCHEMA.ElasticDocument main
using(
 select --top 100
  PROGRAMCODE, 
  CustomerToOffer_DELTA.CustomerCode || '_' || targetUser.offercode as id, 
  CustomerToOffer_DELTA.CustomerCode  as customercode, 
  targetUser.OFFERCODE,targetUser.PRODUCTCODE, targetUser.STORECODE
  from (
     select Max(PROGRAMCODE) as PROGRAMCODE, offerCode,
     ARRAY_AGG (distinct productcode) within group (order by productcode) as productcode , 
     ARRAY_AGG (distinct storeCode) within group (order by storeCode) as storecode 
     from  RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETUSER
     group by offerCode
 ) targetUser
join  RS_SCHEMA.CustomerToOffer_DELTA on CustomerToOffer_DELTA.OfferCode = targetUser.OfferCode
and Metadata$Action = 'INSERT' and  transactionid = $TransactionId
) indexchange on indexchange.Id = main.Id
when matched then update set
                            PROGRAMCODE = indexchange.PROGRAMCODE,
                            CUSTOMERCODE = indexchange.CUSTOMERCODE,
                            OFFERCODE = indexchange.OFFERCODE,
                            PRODUCTCODE = indexchange.PRODUCTCODE,
                            STORECODE = indexchange.STORECODE
when not matched then insert (PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE)
values (PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE);

end if;
end;

DELETE FROM RS_SCHEMA.ElasticDocument AS main USING (
     select offerCode from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_MASS_DELTA
     where Metadata$Action = 'DELETE' and Metadata$IsUpdate =FALSE
     and OFFERID not in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_MASS_DELTA  where Metadata$Action = 'INSERT')
     and OFFERID not in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_MASS)
      group by offerCode
 ) AS index_delete 
WHERE index_delete.OfferCode = main.OfferCode;
 
MERGE INTO RS_SCHEMA.ElasticDocument AS main
USING (
    select Max(PROGRAMCODE) as PROGRAMCODE,
    'MASS_' || offercode as id, 
    'MASS' as CUSTOMERCODE,
     offerCode as offercode,
     ARRAY_AGG (distinct productcode) within group (order by productcode) as productcode, 
     [] as storecode 
     from  RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_MASS
     where OFFERID in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_MASS_DELTA) 
     and PROGRAMCODE not in (select PROGRAMCODE from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERPROGRAM where ENGINE = 'HEALTH')
     and PROGRAMCODE != 'AUTO_LOAD_OFFERS'
     group by offerCode
 ) indexchange ON indexchange.Id = main.Id
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET
							PROGRAMCODE = indexchange.PROGRAMCODE,
					        CUSTOMERCODE = indexchange.CUSTOMERCODE,
                            OFFERCODE = indexchange.OFFERCODE,
                            PRODUCTCODE = indexchange.PRODUCTCODE,
                            STORECODE = indexchange.STORECODE
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE)
VALUES (PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE);

DELETE FROM RS_SCHEMA.ElasticDocument AS main USING (
     select offerCode from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETSTORE_DELTA
     where Metadata$Action = 'DELETE' and Metadata$IsUpdate =FALSE
     and OFFERID not in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETSTORE_DELTA where Metadata$Action = 'INSERT')
     and OFFERID not in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETSTORE)
      group by offerCode
 ) AS index_delete 
WHERE index_delete.OfferCode = main.OfferCode;
 
MERGE INTO RS_SCHEMA.ElasticDocument AS main
USING (
    select Max(PROGRAMCODE) as PROGRAMCODE,
    'MASS_' || offercode as id, 
    'MASS' as CUSTOMERCODE,
     offerCode as offercode,
     ARRAY_AGG (distinct productcode) within group (order by productcode) as productcode, 
     ARRAY_AGG (distinct storeCode) within group (order by storeCode) as storecode 
     from  RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETSTORE
     where OFFERID in (select OFFERID from RS_SCHEMA.OFFERSTAGINGRUNING_TARGETSTORE_DELTA) 
     group by offerCode
 ) indexchange ON indexchange.Id = main.Id
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET
							PROGRAMCODE = indexchange.PROGRAMCODE,
					        CUSTOMERCODE = indexchange.CUSTOMERCODE,
                            OFFERCODE = indexchange.OFFERCODE,
                            PRODUCTCODE = indexchange.PRODUCTCODE,
                            STORECODE = indexchange.STORECODE
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE)
VALUES (PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE);

BEGIN
INSERT INTO Rs_Schema.ElasticDocument_delta 
    (ROWID,PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE,METADATA$ACTION,METADATA$ISUPDATE,METADATA$ROW_ID,TRANSACTIONID)
SELECT ROWID,PROGRAMCODE,ID,CUSTOMERCODE,OFFERCODE,PRODUCTCODE,STORECODE,METADATA$ACTION,METADATA$ISUPDATE,METADATA$ROW_ID,'@{pipeline().parameters.TransactionId}'
FROM Rs_Schema.ElasticDocument_check
WHERE 
    Metadata$Action != 'DELETE' 
    OR (Metadata$Action = 'DELETE' 
        AND Metadata$IsUpdate = FALSE);

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE RS_SCHEMA.STAGINGELASTICDOCUMENT_DELTA(
    partition_num NUMBER AUTOINCREMENT,
    ID VARCHAR,
    CUSTOMERCODE VARCHAR, 
    OFFERCODE VARCHAR,
    PRODUCTCODES ARRAY,
    STORECODES ARRAY,
    METADATA$ACTION VARCHAR(50),
    METADATA$ISUPDATE BOOLEAN
);

INSERT INTO RS_SCHEMA.STAGINGELASTICDOCUMENT_DELTA 
(ID, CUSTOMERCODE, OFFERCODE, PRODUCTCODES, STORECODES, METADATA$ACTION, METADATA$ISUPDATE)
SELECT
    ID,
    CUSTOMERCODE, 
    OFFERCODE,
    PRODUCTCODE as PRODUCTCODES,
    STORECODE as STORECODES,
    METADATA$ACTION,
    METADATA$ISUPDATE
FROM RS_SCHEMA.ELASTICDOCUMENT_DELTA
WHERE 
    TransactionId = '@{pipeline().parameters.TransactionId}';

END;

activities.name: Trigger StreamSets CRUD and Clear cache

dependsOn.activity: Trigger StreamSets CRUD and Clear cache
